Arkansas

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: Duration of two years or less presumed reasonable
Wage threshold: n/a tivities prohibited
Specific duration limit: Duration of two years or less presumed reasona
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to ensure reasonableness in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited under Arkansas law. Replace with: "The employee agrees not to engage in any competing activities within a 50-mile radius of the company's headquarters in Arkansas for a period of 12 months following termination of employment." Ensure the clause is tailored to the specific job duties and industry to comply with Arkansas law.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
